casebody.data:
G. A. Copp, Inc., appellee, v. Gideon A. Copp, appellant.Gen. No. 25,330.Suit to enjoin unfair competition in use of trade name. Decree for complainant. Interlocutory appeal from the Superior Court of Cook county; the Hon. Denis E. Sullivan, Judge, presiding. Heard in the Branch Appellate Court.Affirmed.Opinion filed December 2, 1919.

Barnes, J., dissenting.

Thompson, Tyrrell & Chambers, for appellant.McGilvray, Eames & Vaughan, for appellee. Mr. Presiding Justice Matchett

delivered the opinion of the court.
